title: Winter of Code Inaugural Ceremony
description: The official start of Winter of Code! Join us for an introductory session where we'll walk you through the program's timeline, expectations, and the exciting journey ahead.
detailedDescription: This is our flagship event where we launch Winter of Code 4.0. Meet the core team, understand the program structure, and get inspired by previous success stories. All participants must attend this inaugural session.

title: Proposal Writing Workshop
description: A week-long workshop focused on helping students write strong, well-structured project proposals.
detailedDescription: Learn from experienced mentors how to craft compelling project proposals. This workshop covers proposal structure, documentation best practices, timeline planning, and addressing mentor feedback. Bring your project ideas!
agenda: Common Mistakes & How to Avoid Them - 3:30 PM

title: Community Bonding Meet & Greet
description: Connect with fellow participants, mentors, and organization representatives in a casual, fun environment.
detailedDescription: This informal gathering is the perfect opportunity to network, make friends, and understand your project better. Mentors will be available for one-on-one conversations. Games and icebreakers included!

title: Coding Phase Kickoff
description: Official start of the main coding phase. Get your development environment ready and understand the expectations.
detailedDescription: This is the moment when coding officially begins! Get detailed instructions on setting up your development environment, accessing repositories, and establishing communication channels with your mentor.

title: Mid-Coding Phase Check-in
description: Mid-point review and progress assessment. Share your progress and get feedback from mentors.
detailedDescription: We're halfway through the coding phase! This check-in helps ensure everyone is on track. Share your accomplishments, discuss challenges, and adjust your timeline if needed.

title: Debugging & Optimization Session
description: Learn advanced debugging techniques and code optimization strategies from industry experts.
detailedDescription: This hands-on workshop covers debugging tools, performance profiling, and optimization best practices. Learn how to write efficient code and solve common performance bottlenecks.

title: Final Submission Guidelines Webinar
description: Understand submission requirements, documentation standards, and evaluation criteria before the final deadline.
detailedDescription: Final phase! This webinar covers what mentors will be evaluating, how to document your work, and best practices for final submissions. Don't miss this crucial information!

title: Winter of Code Closing Ceremony
description: The official conclusion of Winter of Code. Celebrate achievements and recognize outstanding contributors.
detailedDescription: Join us for the grand finale! Celebrate your accomplishments, hear inspiring talks from successful participants, and witness the recognition of outstanding contributions. This is a must-attend celebration event!

title: Mentorship 1-on-1 Sessions (Weekly)
description: Regular one-on-one sessions with your assigned mentor for project guidance and career advice.
detailedDescription: Every participant is assigned a mentor who will guide them through the project journey. These weekly sessions are your chance to discuss progress, get feedback, and ask for advice on technical or career-related matters.

title: Open Office Hours
description: Drop-in sessions where you can ask any questions to the team and fellow participants.
detailedDescription: Stuck on something? Need advice? Join our weekly open office hours on Discord where mentors and team members are available to help. No appointment needed - just drop in!
